content.detailedDescription:
At about 7 pm yesterday, january 15, 2005, i was taking out the trash and noticed an extremely bright light in the sky.  it was brighter than any stars or planes in the area.  i called my wife and we watched it for about 10 minutes before grabbing our cameras.  we ended up watching the object and taking pictures for about 40 minutes or so.  we live close to the atl international airport and several times planes were pretty close to the object.  after looking at our pictures and video we noticed the object was disc shaped.  at the time the object appeared to change shape.  around 7:40pm the object dimmed and slowly moved out of site.  it was a very interesting experience.  we aren���t sure what we saw���  we love going to air shows and are used to the air traffic in the area.  this was definitely out of the ordinary.

i used a canon 50d and my wife used a nikon d90
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Disc like object observed in the sky for about 40 minutes before dimming and leaving the distance.

content.detailedDescription: A friend was talking about how many more stars he would be able to see in colorado, and we were all just looking at the sky, and suddenly some movement got our attention. those tiny faded stars start moving in a formation with no sound. about 3 groups of 4 'stars'. sometimes each group would be in line, sometimes form a triangle and suddenly they all moved like bees in a hive. there was no tail, like meteor shower, and they were very pale light blue, just like small stars. i'm a skeptical person, and i was trying to compare to balloons, but it was dark and no wind, and these things were flying really fast. i don't know what this is, but i hadn't seen anything like that before.
content.summary: 3 groups of 4 'small stars' start moving and making formations at night

content.detailedDescription: in 1978 i lived in a duplex in stevensville, michigan. i lived a quarter mile form the cook nuclear power plant. one night while watching tv, i got up to get something to drink and noticed a really bright light outside in the backyard. we had a sliding glass door that lead out back. i opened the door and went out to find out where the light was coming from. outside to my left i saw a bright yellow/orange beam of light shining to the ground. i looked up to see where it was coming from and could not see to the top and i did not hear any sound from it. at this point i felt a sense of fear and went back inside. my girlfriend at that time worked at the power plant as a security guard. the next morning she came home and asked me to guess what she and others had seen at the power plant. she was shocked when i replied, a ufo. then i told her what i had seen. the next day when her son and daughter came home after staying in battle creek for the weekend. i told them what i seen and they did,nt believe me, so i took them to the bottom of the hill and to the left where the bottom of the light was shining. when we got there, we noticed that the weeds that were around 4ft high were laid flat in about a 12ft.Round area. not burned, just laid flat. on the way back to the house i noticed there were two small steams between the house and the highway. the one closest to the house had what looked like gas on top of the water, and the one closest to the highway was clear. the strangest thing living there were our neighbors. they had two small children ages from three to five. the walls between our duplexes were thin, and in the year we lived there we never heard the children, laugh or cry or anything. i never spoke to the man, but i did speak to the woman on one occasion. she seemed very pleasant and nice, but at the same time had air about her that seemed very distant and cold. kind of what it would feel like talking to an android, and no i don't think she was an android, but the feeling was so strange and i have never forgot it.                                                               if you are wondering why i am writing about this now, i was talking with a friend the other day and the subject came up and my friend said i should contact mufon so i did. this sighting was also reported in the local news papers and other witnesses that worked at the cook nuclear power plant.
content.summary: Observed a bright orange/yellow shining straight down to the ground, could not see to the top.

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i were driving southeast on hwy. 290 towards houston, tx. we were surrounded by farm fields on a clear dark night. we were a few miles from the small town of waller, which is about 20 miles from houston.

i was driving and there were almost no other cars on the road. my mother said, "what is that?" and i looked out her window to see a boomerang formation of large white glowing lights. it looked unlike anything i'd ever seen. i turned the rearview mirror up so there would be no possible reflections on it and asked her to lower her window for an unobstructed view. she did that and they were still there.

i slowed down and, as we watched, the long arm of the boomerang (5 spherical lights) would lose one light as the short arm gained one light--simultaneously. i found this very odd and this action was repeated at least three times with a period of stability (about 30 sec. to several minutes )in between these changes. all the lights glowed steadily, were pure white, had somewhat fuzzy edges, and made no sound whatsoever.

the boomerang configuration continued at a steady unwavering path across the sky, with periodic formation changes as described above, until suddenly all lights took off high into the sky in a nw direction. the boomerang shape was constant as they shot off silently and super fast.

as far as i know, i removed all variables or complicating factors regarding clear vision of the lights without any reflections on glass, mirrors, metal in the car or even eyeglasses. i did suggest that we stop along the road to watch more intently but my mother was terrified and begged me not to do it, so i didn't. i was in my early twenties and my mother was in her early 50's at the time of the sighting.

at the time, we regarded the lights as separate objects but, in retrospect, they could have been part of a very large craft. if so, as it banked then that might explain the loss of a light on the long arm of the v shape while the short arm gained a light at the same time. the lights were never in the form of an equilateral triangle. at no point could we see any outline of a large craft either. the space between the lights were dead black as was the sky in general. the size of the configuration was extremely large.
content.summary: Driving with my mother on the highway when we saw a silent boomerang shape of white lights. windows were down on the car.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my witness who also seen everything that i saw were in a park where it was already turning night time still a lil bit of light far out i was looking towards the nearest hospital from the view we were at and suddenly i saw a object jus jump up from some where near the hospital and then stay up in tha sky so i thought it was a helicopter but then i notice a light that was spinning around the belly of the object and then drop back down and within 1-2 mins appear flying out not too far from where i seen it towards the sky as if it was goin out into space. and the next one appeared near some woods near the hospital and was heading towards the other object but this one didnt  have a light it looked like an outline of a car(best description)without the wheels jus like the 1st one. now seeing the first one i told my witness do u see that at first he didnt see but once it was flying away he saw it . so now about 10 after witnessing the 2 objects i noticed to my far left side that more lighting were apearring now these lightings appearred in a form like a triangle there were 6 of them. once they came into a closer view than tha other 2 i told my witness" do you see that?! are you seening what im seening?! are we really seeing this with our eyes?! now remember we are in a park and its outside in an suburban area where its really quite at night. so once they came into closer view i shouted out f-you ufos and was giving it the middle fingers and suddenly the first odject turned its lights down to me now i know its gonna sound a bit werid but thats what happened. ask your self when has something in the sky at night ever put its lights at you. and immediately i was in shock because that lights appear right as i was yelling. me and while this was happening they didnt make a sound the distance between me and then object i would saw would be like looking at a building with about 10-20 or floors my best guess now what hit me the most was that they didnt make a sound now anything thats close would make a sound but this didnt the other 5 objects just followed it. i pulled out my phone n tired to take a shot for evidence but not appeared just a black screen not even a light or anything so i put it away it was a crap camera on it now all of these things apearred like they were going in the same direction out into space and the 6 objets were no travelling fast or anything but really slow. we watched them fly away now. as soon as they went off into the sky we headed away and were talking to each other about what we saw not 1 or 2 but 8 objects. to this day i still remember what i saw that night the experience what incredible seeing this
content.summary: The 1st one had a red light going around the belly 3rd ufo turned its lights at me

content.detailedDescription: Sunday night at work pine orchard sunoco..10214 baltimore national pike.. ellicott city maryland...Stepped outside to smoke... looking to my left north east 45 degrees left of route 40...Noticed 3 large red and orange light in the sky..Also noticed 1 large whitelight just to the right and above other3 ufos...The white light very bright sat still...The first3 light flashing very bright red and orange..These 3 ufos were moving closer together...Almost comming together as one..They seperatedback and forth like this for about 15  to 20 minutes..A couple of times they moved away looked like they were out of my sight very small..Then they came back..This  lasted for about 23  minutes total time then they disappeared ..Just like me or you turning off a light switch...I felt no ill effects or time loss...My only reaction was darn the one day i left my camera at home....These objects were not jetliners or regular typeairplains there were a couple of planes in the area..These ojects were 10 to15 times bigger than a jet..
content.summary: Outside 2 smoke looked left spotted 4 ufos to close to be planes..

content.detailedDescription: On my way to work at 4:30 am. standing in front of disneyland i noticed under the cloudcover a bright red pulsateing object. moving slowy west and then making a horeshoe turn. the object than proceded to "shoot" straight down a smaller red object. it than, still in full view under the cloud cover went out or just vanished. i was fully awake and aware when this occured. it was clearly not a conventional aircraft. it was fluid or plasma like, the object. i am on the bus filing this report on my way to work only an hour since the sighting. my feeling is being  irritated. sooner or later someone will have awnser for these sightings.
content.summary: On my way to work at 4:30 am. standing in front of disneyland i noticed under the cloudcover a bright red pulsateing object. moving slowy west and then making a horeshoe turn. the object than proceded to "shoot" straight down a smaller red object.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I have seen the objects i am about to describe many times before, but i only recently felt compelled to write about them. every time i think about it, it sends chills up and down my spine. i feel strange connection to this object; i feel as if it is always watching me.

im not sure when my initial encounter with this specific object occurred, but it had to be at least two years ago.  i do recall talking to my girlfriend on the phone at night, gazing into the night sky as we converse about this and that. a flashing red, blue and white object (in that order) that seemed to me to be a peculiar star. i paid some attention to this star as i conversed with my girlfriend, when suddenly the light split in two. i watched in awe as the light that branched off from the initial light had been observing, like an act of mitosis, and it began to slowly circle the light it spawned from.  i then began to explain to my girlfriend what i had experienced, and i told her to hold on while i switched my phone to the camera mode.  during this time, the second light had vanished, but the initial light was still there! every picture i took came out very fuzzy. i then proceeded to record a video of this peculiar light, but i could not even tell that the light was flashing in the video.
i went in to get my fathers video camera; it was better quality than my phone camera.  in the time it took me to get my dads recorder, the light had vanished.

the light would reappear frequently, but i have yet been able to figure out a pattern in which it appears.

the light has only split like a cell undergoing mitosis a few times after that; most of the time it just appears, hovers, then vanishes mysteriously.  the most recent time it split was january 7, 2012. once again, i was unprepared with the encounter with the familiar, peculiar flashing object in the sky.  it seemed to me that it knew when i was not looking, as that was when it would always disappear. i always feel an incredible rush of fear when this object appears; its almost as if this object the fear within me, as i did not choose to be scared, but the scared feeling consumed and overwhelmed me.  i have had some near death experiences that did not horrify me as much as this object has. 

i would not write this report if i did not believe every word of it was true. i consider myself to be a rational person, but this object has really confused and awed me. i hope this report is of some value to you. i will write a new report if anything else happens.
content.summary: Blue,white,red flashing object

content.detailedDescription:
I'm living on the 4th floor in an apartment house. at 7:50am today i was watching outside my kitchen window to observe some strange thing's going on in a neighbour house. while watching i recognized something like an orb or a sphere appearing behind that building i was looking at. it was ascending behind that building. from my distance it was the size of a small pill, like aspirin or so. i do not now the actual distance, but i think it was more then 2 miles away. i think so, because on the opposite side of my position (in my back so to speak) we have the biggest german airport (frankfurt), and this airport is about 3 miles away, linear distance. i use to watch aircrafts landing and starting all the time and i know what they look like in the dark and in the twilight and i know their flightpaths. i also used to work over at the airport for several years, therefore i do know that my sighting was no common aircraft, nor a helicopter! 
so i know that there are no civilian flightpaths and i never watched an aircraft in that direction i was looking at (i am living in this appartment for about 4 years now).
the actual size of the craft was maybe the size of a smaller passenger jet, when i compare it to the aircrafts that can be watched every minute coming in over at the airport.
it was at first just hovering over(behind) that appertment building, stood still for about a minute, then it slowly started moving to the west. it was glowing and sparkling in all kinds of colours. i took my binoculars to get a closer look on it. i could't see any fixed shape, it looked round to me, like a ball or a sphere. the outlines were dizzy because the lights were glowing and pulsating so bright. the pulsating and blinking had no special pattern, it blinked in the 'back', then in 'front', the top and so on in no specific order or pattern. unlike an aircraft. there were no specific position light's like on an airplane or helicopter. it was just covered in changing, flickering, blinking, pulsating lights. no trails, no sound to it. couldn't take photo of it, it was too far away.
after a couple of minutes watching, i yelled for my girlfrind who was in the bathroom. by the time she showed up, the craft was behind a tree that's right in front of our house, so we couldn't see it anymore. i was a bit dissapointed and went to the bathroom myself after a minute waiting. shortly after that my girl told me to come back because she saw it, too. it showed up again, passed the tree and dissapeared again behind a chimney of another house. unfortunatelyl i didn't have the chance to see it appearing behind the trees, i wasn't fast enough going back into the kitchen. 
we went outside the house into the yard immediately to see if it is still somewhere in the skies, but it was gone. 
my girl is also pretty sure that this was no common aircraft (just for your information, my girl is a non-beliver, she's very very sceptic). she was very confused and excited about it. 
so i will start observing this direction in the sky a little bit more now. maybe i will be lucky to see more unknown flying objects. 

greetings from germany!
content.summary: Bright sparkeling object

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the back deck smoking a cigarette, looking at the stars as i normally do.  i noticed this small star-like light moving through the sky, i believe the direction is west to east.  it appeared to be a dim bluish white light. i thought it was nothing special, just a satellite. after about a minute it got really bright and changed colors to a yellowish orange light as if a plane had come out of the earths shadow into the sun only if it was a plane it would have to be going east to west to accomplish such a feat.  a couple of seconds later what appeared to be similar to a jets afterburners come on at which point it picked up speed and a couple of seconds later dissappeared in the eastern sky right before reaching orions leg/belt section.  also to note there was the ever so slightest separation between the object itself and its "tail". 

my only reaction was to tell my girlfriend and she posted about it on facebook. she also went outside so i could show her the path. this happened ony a minute after my sighting and after i showed her the path i ran back inside due to air temp.  apearently there were to more objects criss crossing along that same path within minutes of my sighting that she had seen and described to me as if they had followed or were searching for the object i had seen.
content.summary: I was watching what i thought was a satellite move through the sky when it suddenly picked up speed and dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were hanging out at a place we like to call "the spot" its a business street that ends in a court with a bike trail attatched to it and we were hanging at this business just up the street a little and after he said he had to go so he dropped me off at my car that was parked at the court near the bike trail and i got inide turned it on sat for just a minute or two to let it warm up and my friend left. so by myself noone around and approxamately little after 12 maybe close to 12:10 a.M and i put my car into gear started to make the u turn to leave and as im turn about half way through the turn i look into the sky above a building and in that second i saw a star like light bigger then a star and blue like an led light come from nowhere it seems like and went straight up and dissapeared in a single second maybe less. from my point of view in my car if i held my hand up to the spot in the sky where it happened it would have only been a fore finger length long it traveled. then as i drove away i felt such unnatural fear in my body for no reason at all and i was concious of me being scared and couldnt realize why it was just not normal at all. as soon as i saw it i did think that it was a ufo purely because i know that kinda thing doesnt happen often especially in my town all we got is helicopters here. but even through my fear i drove home and just went to sleep.
content.summary: Quick ascending blue light.

content.detailedDescription: I saw something that looked like a very bright star stationary in the sky.  it then began to move very fast across the sky.  it was blinking red, white, and blue.  not sure what this was.  could have been a plane i guess.
content.summary: Red, white, and blue lights bliniking randomly flying very fast across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were coming back from pigeon forge she was driving and i was lookin at the clouds then out of the corner of my eye i seen a reflection from the sun on what appeared to be a plane at first i told my girlfriend to look up and see what she thought it was she said she didn't know then she pointed out it had no wings and at the altitude it was at was much to small to be a plane i kept watching as it passed by us on interstate 26 it looked like a cigar shape it was moving at a higher speed than most planes i have seen when the sun shined off the object it looked silver it was almost to bright to focus on when the sun didn't hit the object it was a dull white color after looking at the object it got in behind a cloud we waited for it to exit from behind the cloud but we could not see it any longer
content.summary: Cigar shaped craft

content.detailedDescription: i was hanging out the window did not hear a sound pointed it out to my brother                                                      did not take 5 to 10 second for him to put his back on the window and point up to the object and                            took off with no sound ..Not flying .... but hovering over our building at this time and place that were not the only that could have seen that.We try to inform our mother and she brush off.                     to this day still talk about it like it happen yesterday.Willing to be tested p.S went tore the lake.....The ship sat in a angle took off over lake mich,
content.summary: Me and my brother watches out the window every night, this normal night looking could not believe it i seen it first .

content.detailedDescription: Pulsating sound from abov the car on county rd 199 carey ohio sound kinda magnetic and looked behind woods and saw flaame shooting horizontal from ground to air like flame thrower and constant didnt stop then whn passed flame sound stops
content.summary: Flame

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from my girlfriends aunts house when i noticed a bright like star in the sky. i looked for the north star to be sure it was not that and continued to keep my eye on the object. when i got home and kept an an eye on in with no other bright lights around i witnessed a aura of lights emincing from its self. i watched the object for almost an hour when a plane in the same distance was approaching the object but the object faded away when the plane came near. as the plane flew through the object reappeared and im still watching it as i type this. i knew all of this to be real because my girlfiend was witnessing this whole event with me as well.
content.summary: Bright object in sky at night no cloudcover flashing all different color lights hovering

content.detailedDescription:
Case #34825 on 1-15-12 @ 4:11pm i had a phone interview with a witness who on 10-27-11, during his nightly walk observed a stationary/hovering object on the horizon with blinking lights at about 25/30 degrees and 1/4-1/2 miles from his location. the reason he noticed the object was because it had bright lights. the approximate time of the sighting was 20:30. the object was hovering low over the hills sw of his location. the night was dark and clear and the sky full of stars. witness claims to always "look up" at the sky. living on a flight path, the sky is always full of commercial aircraft. witness watched the object for several minutes before it "vanished in a blur".
witness claims to have had many sightings.  multiple sightings have been reported on the mufon site by the witness.
content.summary: Witness observed craft with blinking lights while taking a walk

content.detailedDescription: It was a beautiful day in an august of 09' on sabbath and i happened to just get up and walk out the front door and look right at it for some reason.  i kept my ufo camera right next to the door on top of a cabinet at that time so i grabbed it as quick as i could, took these seconds of video then as i was refocusing i could not find it anymore, but i could hear it.  there was a buzzing hum coming from the object that sounded like a really muffled prop plane
content.summary: Invisible triangle video

content.detailedDescription:
We where driving north on ocean ave. in monmouth beach. exactly where the sea wall starts i saw a huge diamond shape hovering over the shoreline. it had dense clouds around it, as if they produced them themselves. we could see red,yellow and white lights flash in around the center, corners of the diamond shoe. them they flashed around the whole perimeter. we saw one beam of white light. then so quickly it shot out right in front of our car then right back to the shoreline. others saw this as traffic came to almost a full stop. we all drove slowly watching the object follow us. it stayed over the shoreline as we drove. as we entered sea bright it stopped, then in a blink of an eye it shot straight out over the ocean. my husband and i went to the cove restaurant. thats where we were going for dinner when we saw the ufo, i have no doubt that was what it was. neither does my husband. when we got to the restaurant, our friend was the manager. that night her bartender didnt show up and she was stuck filling in. so we ended up having dinner at the bar. as we told her what we has just seen. people started coming in, it was fairly quite that night. a family of 5 and a single woman overheard our recount of the story and both of them ( the family and the single woman) both said they saw it also. they defiantly did because the little girl said she saw it shoot over the road and the shoot back over the shoreline. she said she saw it stop for a second in front of a silver car. we where driving a silver bmw. she didnt hear me tell michelle, the manager that part. she came in after i had told michelle that part.This is my third experience with ufos. after my first experience when i was 22. im 44 now. i would wake in the middle of the night at the same time for months. thats a whole other story. but that one is hard to repeat as most think im nuts. all i can say is, there is no way you can pull out of the holland tunnel and end up at exit 145 on the garden state parkway. you should exit into hoboken and then get onto the nj turnpike. two hour had gone by when we realized we where on the parkway. i would 
ike to add that since my first encounter, i have had some odd health issues and visions. like i said, its hard to talk about. people think i am nuts. oh, i do, every once in a while wake up unable to move for about fourth seconds. and when that happens, i have two spots on each hand, like when you get a blood test. they are in the same place on each hand. i would be happy to tell all three stories if you think they would help.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: My husband and i saw the diamond like object over the shoreline.Flashing lights, clouds emmited. followed us as we drove down ocean ave.Then abrubtly apeared in fron of our car, then shot back to shoreline. others saw this

content.detailedDescription: I was at my friends house with my girlfriend and we were having a fire outside. i kept having a feeling like i was being watched or something strange was going on. i walked out from the backyard out to the road to get away from the fire light and to look around. i went back to the fire to get my girlfriend and took her out to the road to see what she thought and she felt like someone was watching her as well.  we noticed a star/planet that was extra bright.  i jokingly pointed up at it and said," look there they are!"  that second there was a flash or something behind me that immediately made me turn around. when i did i saw a very large triangle craft that was "see through." you could see stars behind it as it moved. seeing the stars through it as it moved was kind of like looking at a fish in a stream, when the craft passed the stars they kind of jumped positions like refraction was taking place. the three points of the triangle were leaving a bluegreen trail behind them. this light illuminated the edges of the craft. the front two edges of the craft were also making the air glow but not like the 3 points which were leaving a long trail. the craft was silent and moving very slow. then all of a sudden the craft moved very fast in the direction it was heading.  the apparent size of the bluegreen trails that is was leaving behind was only a few inches, however when the craft "took off" the bluegreen trails stretched across the sky almost to the horizon. the two lines coming off of the the "wing tips" were converging as it got farther away and looked smaller and smaller, but they never met/came together. all of a sudden it stopped or disappeared. it could have just stopped and i would not be able to see it as it was "see through." when it "took off" it looked just like it does on the movies when a ship goes "warp speed" or whatever. the trails it was leaving instantly stretched across the sky. next my attention was drawn to what my girlfriend was looking at which was what looked like a star moving very fast across the sky.  then while it was traveling in a straight direction(about 90 degrees from the path of the triangle)it moved in like a semi circle and continued in the same direction it was heading, as if it was going around something in its path. very strange to see something move like that.  it looked like it had no inertia, traveling the same speed as it made the turn as it did when it was going straight. it was a very fluid motion. then it traveled about the same distance i saw it travel up to when it made the turn and it "went out." it was no longer glowing at least. i then asked my girlfriend if she saw the triangle n she said she was watching the second object i saw the whole time. i then exclaimed "no ones going to believe us! that was crazy!" i told her about the triangle craft in detail and asked what she saw. i was in disbelief and was excited to have seen such a huge craft. the triangle was probably wider than a dozen 747s!  we kept watching the sky the whole night but only saw airplanes with strobe lights. fourteen of them to be exact. they kept flying all over the sky the rest of the night. fourteen planes traversing the sky.  when it became light out the sun revealed chemtrails all over the sky! i dont know if you believe in chem trails but when i was young planes did not leave lines across the sky behind them like they do now. if they did then there wouldnt be any point to sky writing because all planes would leave trails behind them. well anyhow i had never ever seen so many "chemtrails" in the sky before or since. they were dozens and dozens and dozens of them. it looked like a hundreds of rockets were launched in all different directions. i can find out an exact date for this as well as the address it took place at.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I saw a very large triangle shaped craft that was see through but its edges were illuminated by bluegreen light. it was hovering/moving very slow  then took off very fast leaving a trail.  then i saw  a starlike light  traveling in a different direction.

content.detailedDescription:
At that point, i saw another one (or maybe the same one) off to the north about 1/2 half mile from where i saw the first one. this one was very bright, lower in altitude, and sliding west above the park to our nw.

i yelled at my wife to come out side. we both watched it for several minutes. i grabbed the camera, but at this point, it was starting to ascend. it was identical to the first one that i saw. that's four sightings in two days. what gives? i'm not aware of any time lost.
content.summary: After first sighting, this one showed from the north. my wife and i watched it for several minutes

content.detailedDescription:
went out side around 6:20 and saw 3 orange spheres moving rapidly up from the nw toward charlotte. i am in fort mill (foxwood subdivision). the formed up a triangle, hanging motionless. then two of the orange lights appeared to merge into one, then slowly vanished. my neighbor and my wife both saw this. my neighbor stood outside watching as two more orange orbs move upward and hung motionless in the same area as the other 3 had been. these were brighter, more orb-like. the hung there mortionless, sometimes they looked like they were dancing around each other until they vanished. two more, much brighter and more spherical rose up from the same direction. they were much brighter than the previous 5 that i had seen. my neighbor and i continued to watch. these too slowly faded out, to a low magnitude star-like appearance, then disappeared. 
 
i asked my neighbor if he had ever seen anything like this. he said he was a trained pilot, had been in the military and seen a lot of aircraft, but none behaved like this. there was a lot of air traffic  coming  out of charlotte airport (we are in the flight path and one airplane flew almost directly over head. in the distance, beyond the tree line i could see other aircraft making their approach to the airport. 
 
what ever these orange orbs were, they did not behave like aircraft.  nor were they meteors and fireballs (i have observed and reported these also in the past to the american meteor society). they were not planets, or stars (i���ve been a sky watcher/amateur astronomer for years). they could have been flares or fireworks from the carowinds area north of fort mill, but they did not behave like fireworks.
 
i did not notice any more orbs after 6:28pm, as i was taking garbage to recycle. i keep looking but failed to observer any further orange orbs as i drove off and came back.
 
i do not know what these were. but there were at least 3 witnesses who observed the same thing in the sky.
 

will provide photo with sketch later.
content.summary: Orange orbs rising from behind treeline, forming triangle, then fading out. more orbs rose to same area and hovered.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my cousin were in the car around 4:25 am to go to adoration for her mom who was out of town for the weekend. we had just parked the car when she asked me if i was seeing what she saw. she noticed the lights in the reflextion of the window in front of us because the thing was happening behind us. she saw it first and told me that it was two lights and it looked like they did a little dance and then collided. when i saw it, it was a huge red glowing flame electrical circle right above the tree line. we were outside and it was silent. my first thought was it could have been a helicopter because they hover, but i heard nothing. the light was big and it had a hole in the middle of it. it lasted about a minute but it seemed for a while. it slowly descended toward the tree line in a downward line and then we lost it in the trees. my feelings during this were....As if i was being watched. i remember holding my breath and then once it was done just being in  a state of confusion and disbelief. i never really believed in ufo sightings because i just thought people could make really good video's. but this my friends.....Was something that made me lose sleep and ill never forget that.
content.summary: Was in the car with my cousin and we saw the light in a reflection of a window. saw two lights collide become one and then slowly went above the tree line and then desend and it was completly silent.

content.detailedDescription: on jan 14, 2012 at approximately 6:20 pm i went for a walk arounf the south half of the rv park where we are spending the winter on the colorado river near parker, az.  i had covered about 2/3rds of the route when i noticed a bright, reddish light off to west over the river. i at first thought that it might be a planet that i had failed to notice earlier because there was some light cloud cover. but, the clouds slid behind it and a commercial jet was high over head above it. its height is hard to estimate, maybe 1,200 - 1,500 ft. it was slowly sliding south and gave off no emissions. it did not have any appendiges or emit any sound. it began to ascend as i rounded the corner en route to our 5th wheel. it was now dark.
content.summary: Close to dark and was hovering at about 1,500 ft emitting red light and then sliding to the so before ascending

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on my porch when i noticed a star formation that didn't seem familiar. i started to loo closely at it which formed a triangle shape. i know their are many stars that can create the seem effect but i noticed something strange. it had two more lights which sat between the point light and the bottom two lights. as i noticed that i could see the bottom right light start to glow into an orange color. this light began to pulsate brighter and dimmer as the lights begin to drift up higher. i could see some sort of dark undertones that made it look solid. i also could see a plane flying towards it. the plane actually some how flew begind the the lower light of the object. as i tried to to stare at it more intently i could see a small light hovering from the top to the middle of the object. then as my mind began to think this might actually be a ufo a flying lighted object struck right in front of the object. it kind of made me jump because in the back of my head i had been rationalizing that this was my mind playing a cruel joke on me. i went inside and told my sister that i had just seen a ufo. i went back outside and the lights were gone.

note: right before all this happened i had seen a large orange cloud that freaked me out cause it looked like fire was burning under it. for a second i thought the neighborhood across the street was on fire. it almost look like smoke it was a cloud.
content.summary: Second ufo encounter (a triangle shaped ship and strange "shooting star")

content.detailedDescription:
i have liver disease.  six years ago i had a dozen orbs bring me back from the brink of death.  they performed an operation on my liver that involved the use of magnetism.  they magnetically drew toxins, or maybe even scar tissue from my liver.  i saw them with my naked eye.  my liver was shutting down, and i have my medical file that reflects a 180 degree turn in my health.  my liver enzymes were going off the chart, and returned into the normal zone, after my encounter.  again, i have my medical file that reflects a miracle which any doctor in the world will tell you would be impossible without treatment.  it ultimately reveals an instance of divine intervention.  it is documented.  i cannot fake blood-work.
  three years ago, while working on a manuscript recounting my orb experience, my daughters bought brand new digital cameras.  having seen orb videos on youtube, with some claiming to see faces in the orbs themselves, i sent my daughters on an "orb hunt".  they simply shot photos of empty rooms in our home, as well as their school, and even a local street church called "the gathering place", in regina.  
  i have several photos that are definitely communication from these entities.  one in particular is the holy grail.  and, i do not mean "the holy grail of ufo photos".  i mean much, much more than that.  it is a message that i have taken over three years to decipher, as it is so encoded with communication!  it is a photographic representation of the nature of reality.  it is not just "a" message from god.  it is "the" message from god.
  i have determined that these entities act as our guardians. they work for god.  some call them guardian angels.  regardless, the communication that i have discovered encoded into this photo pass three truths that prove that they are of divine origin:  
truth #1:  the communication is made in symbolism, therefore they are in a universal language.  
truth #2:  the symbolic images found within the orbs themselves are too detailed for a human being to make.  they are multidimensional.  they communicate their message when upside-down or spun onto their sides.  as an artist myself, i do realize that no one could ever design an image to the degree of complexity displayed in these orbs.
truth #3:  because the encoded images in the orbs are multidimensional, they cannot be altered. if you alter one hair in one image, you ruin another image when the picture is inverted, or tipped on its side.  this is a very, very important aspect to this communication.  it is a message that simply defies corruption.  it will never change over the course of history.  it is perfect.
  heres what happened.  my eldest daughter was taking some random shots in our home, and she was about take one in my living room, but i wanted to get out of the shot.  i was drinking a tea, and i put my cup down and stood next to her while she took the photo.  there were so many orbs in this particular shot, that i simply chalked it up to dust.  i studied other photos in depth, before studying this shot, as i felt it was defective.  
  i thought the other photos blew my mind.  but, when i finally got around to deciphering the "holy grail", it was then that i truly "lost it"!  the very first photo i studied was basic.  it seemed to depict an angel.  it was blurry, but it was definitely visible.  in hindsight, i realize that i was being "guided" through the process by an unknown force.  the images seemed to get more complex as i studied them.  it was like i went from reading a "dick and jane" picture book to a stephen hawking scientific journal. 
  here is a simple example of symbolism encoded into the setting of the photo itself: the living room cna be spliced perfectly down the center.  the left side symbolizes the "physical realm".  the right side represents the "spiritual realm".  the left side is predominantly blue and green.  "blue and green should never be seen." it is a symbolic reference to being incarnated into the physical world.  nearly all the orbs in the photo (except one, for another symbolic reason) are located on the right side of the image.  this reflects the message that the orbs are "positive entities".  they only do positive actions.  they do not do anything negative.  they work for the "good".  the symbolic imagery gets deeper and deeper.  there is a stereo speaker in the shot on the right side of the photo.  this speaker is "speaking".  it is where the two brightest orbs appear, and these two orbs are overflowing with symbolic imagery.  however, the speaker has imagery in the form of vapor (ectoplasm perhaps?), that actually depicts an image of christ carrying a baby.  this same image is reflected in a hubble telescope photo of the "cone nebula".  it is unnerving, until you understand my interpretation.  it is divine communication that we must take seriously.
  i have determined that my daughter and i must have been guided to create this image, as even the living room itself is rife with encoded meaning.  we did not stage this shot.  it was a random occurrence.  it reinforces the concept that there is no such thing as coincidence.  you will see that the image reflects an intelligent design that could not have been staged.  even if i had staged the setting, i certainly did not digitally alter the image by adding the orbs.  they chose to appear at that precise moment to capture that precise image for their very precise message!
  if a picture is worth a thousand words, and a symbol is worth a thousand pictures, then this one digital image has greater communication than the bible.  i use that comparison, because if im correct (and i am), this image will replace the bible.  i will send the original holy grail (copyrighted), along with some other copyrighted orb photos that add weight to my theory. i simply cannot give you enough information at this time that speaks any better than the images themselves.
  i would love to be interviewed at length.  my evidence defies criticism.
no one could fake this photo.  no one!
content.summary: I sent my two daughters on an orb hunt with new digital cameras for evidence for my  book..

content.detailedDescription:
Was arriving home at 9.55pm when took a brief look at the fairly clear sky when i noticed tiny lights flying in the opposite direction of the scattered cloud wind. they were like small distant stars but were moving in one direction.

i noticed one then another then 2 or 3 together, they kept coming for at least an hour. interested to hear if anyone has spotted this activity.

its as if they were imitating stars but moving in a certain direction. the brightness was like a dim star.
content.summary: Large formation spotted in dubai uae

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were out driving on christmas night when i noticed bright lights. i told my wife to stop and pull over. this was on prospect road off of rt 30 exit in mountville. there were cars passing and i was tryin to stop them but they were ignoring me and driving off fast when they saw them. i didn't hear any noise. two lights flew fast across the sky. i got scared and left after about five minutes. i posted my encounter on facebook  and someone else responded with there encounter at the same time.
content.summary: There were five bright objects in the sky over the fields.

content.detailedDescription: Me, my husband, & two children were traveling in our car at approximately 9:45p from memphis, tn heading into marshall county, ms on january 14, 2012. from the time i got in the car, i mentioned to my husband that there were a lot of stars in the sky. i told him it looked weird. i also saw several bright blinking stars that seemed to change colors (primarily red) & move around. my husband didn't think anything of it. he said they were probably airplanes. i was convinced it was something more going on, so i kept my eyes looking outside the passenger's window while he drove. then suddenly this large white/grayish cigar-disc shaped object with windows appeared out of nowhere right above the trees. it was as big as an airplane and was very close as if it was heading for our car. it appeared right above the trees on the side of the highway.  i screamed to my husband and kids that were sleep in the back seat, "oh my god! do you see that?"  by the time he took his eyes off the road to look up, it was gone. it was moving so fast. he caught the tail end of it. he said he saw something bright & white, but he assumed it was a cellphone tower. he's a big skeptic, but i know what i saw & it was very disturbing. i'm scared to drive my car at night now out of town. something is going on out there. i know i'm not the only one that could have seen it. there were several cars on the highway at the time.
content.summary: Ufo spotted near marshall county, ms on january 14, 2012

content.detailedDescription:
My highschool boyfriend and i were driving on a very rural wooded road. there were no houses near where we were, or any other streets.  we hadn't seen any other cars.  we hadn't done drugs, nor had we been drinking.  we suddenly noticed what i thought at first to be a car coming toward us from the sky, just touching the tops of the trees, and then going through the trees.  i remember shouting.  then it was 3 hours later and we were downtown, approximately 5 miles away.  i felt as though i was waking up from a drugged sleep.  i looked at my boyfriend and he was driving as though he was in a trance.  i asked what time it was, and he told me it was 11pm, over 3 hours from seeing "the car" coming through the trees, and i suggested he drive me home.  we never spoke about what happened until 15 years later when we met up again.  we sat and had coffee and reminisced.  when he was leaving he suddenly stopped and said "do you remember that night..." and i knew what he was talking about.  i said yes.  we stared at each other, and then he left.  
i don't know what this was, but i would like to find out.  i was 17 when it happened, and i'm now 55.  i still clearly remember seeing the lights coming toward us, and i remember vaguely something in the road in front of us.  i remember both of us shouting.  i would like to remember more.
content.summary: Saw what we thought was a car coming out of sky toward us - woke up 3 hours later miles away feeling drugged.
